title: League Friends BETA app... availability
body:
HI,

Recently me and some of my friends got in League Friends BETA app for Android test. Apparently I'm form India I Play in NA server, not only me most of LOL players from India Plays in NA. and the Problem is we are not able to download the League friends app in India. we really love get our hands on the app.
Please make it available Globally, Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey ThamilanDa,
Thanks for reaching out to us. Unfortunately the beta is currently limited to select countries on the play store. When we do our official launch the restriction will be removed and players globally will be able to use the app.

> [{quoted}](name=ManticoreX,realm=NA,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=dHRE1hXw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-11T18:46:19.550+0000)
>
> Hey ThamilanDa,
> Thanks for reaching out to us. Unfortunately the beta is currently limited to select countries on the play store. When we do our official launch the restriction will be removed and players globally will be able to use the app.

This is also for the iOS side as well. I'm from the Caribbean and I play on NA servers cause we speak english. However the app is only available for the US it seems, it always tells me the app isn't available in my store.
